title: Can Anyone Beat Them? Tadej Pogačar Confirms ‘Scary’ UAE Tour de France Support Crew
content:
'Yates is my righthand man, Ayuso and Almeida are super climbing domestiques': Pogačar sees world-class support for Giro-Tour double bid.

Read the full article at Can Anyone Beat Them? Tadej Pogačar Confirms ‘Scary’ UAE Tour de France Support Crew on Velo.
author: ahood
